ygData.subject: RE: Root-breaking and Selo
ygData.msgSnippet: It seems that Verant has made numerous attempts at fixing similar things. It used to happen with minor illusion and they fixed that. I thought they had fixed
ygData.messageBody:
It seems that Verant has made numerous attempts at fixing similar things.
It used to happen with minor illusion and they fixed that. I thought they
had fixed the treeform too...

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: Melaniel [mailto:email@...]
8)Sent: Sunday, August 08, 1999 5:14 PM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: [eqbards] Root-breaking and Selo
8)
8)
8)From: email@... (Melaniel)
8)
8)
8)Do you remember a recent patch that changed Treeform so druids
8)couldn't move while as a tree? Well hold onto your drums but Selo's
8)breaks the tree's roots, and the lovely druids can start being
8)wandering trees again.
8)
8)Not sure if people have mentioned this already, but it sure caused a
8)stir in East Commons when me and my sis were roaming around and I had
8)this big tree chasing after me!!
8)
8)Anyone taking odds that this will get changed in a patch coming soon
8)to a computer near you?
8)
8)Oh, and a big hi to Shada, who I saw sitting naked in front of the
8)bank during the auction, as us wood elves seem to have a habit of
8)doing! Hope you didn't die somewhere too awful sis!
8)
8)See ya all
8)
8)--
8)
8)Saldara
8)High Elf Wizard (20), Mith Marr server
8)
8)Melaniel
8)Wood Elf Bard (10), Mith Marr server
8)
